source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that increases your auto shot damage by 200% and reduces the time between auto shots by 0.5 sec for 10 sec. Casting Trueshot always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Consuming Lock and Load also fires an Explosive Shot at 300% effectiveness.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Taking Nature damage increases your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, and Versatility by 493 for 60 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,263 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,860 to 9,607 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 291 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
The Coward's Violet Target

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Neltharax, Enemy of the Sky

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
